summary: Suspecting that people around him are turning into evil creatures, a troubled man questions whether to protect his only friend from an impending war, or from himself.
cast: MacLeod Andrews|Evan Dumouchel|Margaret Ying Drake|Mick Casale|Elena Greenlee|Laura Ambrose|Ben Blackshear|Perry Blackshear|Julia Guo|Amaani Hamid|Jessie Kim|Sang Wook Kim|Matt Lawrence|Eric Ohrt|Carlos Palacio|Kimberly Parker|Lauren Parkinson
title: They Look Like People
